column5: Yes. I’m away from home now and sometimes I would just tell my friend I want to go home. But at the same time, I actually don’t want to go home because it’s too cold and dramatic a household to be called ‘home’.

Honestly I have been doing this, I moved house every half a year. I tried to go to different places as much as I could, like my whole purpose for working is just so I could go somewhere. I’m in Germany now and it was fine for while but I could really feel my problems coming back and I’m in a really poor mental state right now despite telling myself that I am better and getting better.
